titleStmt.title: The Presbyterian Pater Noster, creed, and Ten Commandments
titleStmt.author: Ashenden, Thomas, 1648 or 9-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tom Tell-Truth at the sign of the Old Kings Head in Axe-yard in King Street, Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Ashenden. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
